forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, followed by isolated thunderstorms during the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early, followed by isolated thunderstorms during the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 1C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 34F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and a few thunderstorms. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and a few thunderstorms. High 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 4C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 39F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
